vote.title: A resolution authorizing the conveyance of a drainage easement containing a total of approximately 8,017 square feet of land to Kaufman County Municipal District No. 6 for the construction, maintenance and use of drainage facilities across City-owned land located at Lake Ray Hubbard - Revenue: Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($1,810.00) and General Fund ($3,000.00)
